diseases.description: Apple scab affects the apple plant and reduces yield.
diseases.precautions: Maintain field hygiene, ensure proper spacing and avoid overhead irrigation.
diseases.solution: Use disease-resistant varieties and apply appropriate fungicides or pesticides.
